column4: hey guys/girls how do you get x to start automaticlly? Have a guy that was doing a update and his laptop crashed now it doesnt boot into x unless he types startx
gdm service is supposed to start automatically and allow the login to X.     what version of ubuntu is he using?
its karmic im not a nix god or anything just trying to help him out is there a way to clean up whatever update broke it? Would a update of Gnome or kde fix it?
No idea. he could alway sjust try a 'sudo apg-get update' and 'sudo apt-get upgrade'
